leave_event.label: Leave event
leave_event.title: Leave the event?
leave_event.description_pending_public: You will be able to join this event by getting an invitation again or by applying to it before {maxRegistrationDate}.
leave_event.description_pending_private: Since this event is private, you will only be able to rejoin if you get invited again.
leave_event.description_ongoing: You won't be able to rejoin since this event is already started.
leave_event.description_ongoing_2: Your tile completions will still count for your team, but all your pending completion requests will be canceled.

kick_from_event.label: Kick from event
kick_from_event.title: Kick {username} from the event?
kick_from_event.description_pending: They will be able to join this event again by getting an invitation or by applying to it before {maxRegistrationDate}.
kick_from_event.description_ongoing: They won't be able to rejoin since this event is already started.
kick_from_event.description_ongoing_completions: Their tile completions will still count for their team, but all their pending completion requests will be canceled.
kick_from_event.description_private: Since this event is private, they will only be able to rejoin if you invite them again.

transfer_ownership.label: Transfer ownership
transfer_ownership.title: Transfer ownership to {username}?
transfer_ownership.description: They will be promoted to <owner>Owner</owner> and you will be demoted to <organizer>Organizer</organizer>. This action cannot be undone.
transfer_ownership.description_simple: They will be promoted to Owner and you will be demoted to Organizer. This action cannot be undone.
